commands-reference.title: Commands Reference
commands-reference.description: This page documents all available Web3FuzzForge CLI commands and their options.

community-test-examples.title: Community Test Examples
community-test-examples.description: This section showcases community-contributed test examples for Web3 security testing. These examples provide real-world patterns for testing common Web3 vulnerability scenarios.

cross-chain-testing.title: Cross-Chain Testing
cross-chain-testing.description: As multi-chain dApps become increasingly common, comprehensive testing across different blockchain networks is critical. Web3FuzzForge provides tools and patterns for testing cross-chain functionality.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Getting started with Web3FuzzForge is straightforward. The tool is distributed via npm and can be installed globally or used with npx.

intro.title: Introduction to Web3FuzzForge
intro.description: Web3FuzzForge is an automated test scaffolding tool for battle-tested Web3 developers who need efficient security testing solutions.

mobile-wallets.title: Mobile Wallet Testing
mobile-wallets.description: Mobile wallets are increasingly important in the Web3 ecosystem. Web3FuzzForge is expanding support for testing mobile wallet interactions to provide comprehensive coverage for multi-platform applications.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Web3FuzzForge is a comprehensive toolkit for testing Web3 dApps, focusing on security and functional testing.

quickstart.title: Quickstart
quickstart.description: Run Your First Test in 5 Minutes

real-wallet-integration.title: Real Wallet Integration
real-wallet-integration.description: While Web3FuzzForge primarily uses mocked wallet behavior for testing, there are scenarios where testing with real wallets provides additional coverage and security verification.

reporting-overview.title: Test Result Reporting
reporting-overview.description: Web3FuzzForge provides a structured reporting system to help you analyze test results, particularly security vulnerabilities found during testing.

security-testing.title: Security Testing
security-testing.description: Web3FuzzForge provides specialized tools for security testing of Web3 applications. This document covers techniques for identifying common vulnerabilities and security issues in dApps.

vulnerability-categorization.title: Vulnerability Categorization
vulnerability-categorization.description: This page provides a standardized approach to categorizing Web3 security vulnerabilities discovered in your tests.

wallet-state-snapshots.title: Wallet State Snapshot Framework
wallet-state-snapshots.description: The wallet state snapshot framework allows you to save and restore wallet states during tests. This feature makes it easier to test complex scenarios without repeating setup steps.
